mapper.select: select count(*) from cart_table where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.update: update cart_table set productQu = productQu + #{productQu} where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.memberId,p.id,m.memberName,p.productName,c.productQu,p.productPrice,(p.productPrice * c.productQu)money from member_table m, product_table p, cart_table c where m.id=c.memberId and p.id=c.productId and c.memberId=#{memberId} order by c.id
